name: Overclockers Dark v2.0
description:
Update of the dark theme for OcUK, including better style, new icons and bug fixes. Customise the theme with your own choice of icons and other modifications.

11/06/2016 * Fixed logo and undeleted style.
           * Added new icons (See 'Newest General Icons')
17/01/2013 * Added 'Forum Width' option for those that want a fixed width forum
.......... * Added more options for 'Maximum image width'
.......... * Finally fixed the rounded quote boxes!!


01/12/2012 * Fixed Christmas pudding logo and added Christmas Avatars option :)
13/08/2011 * Fixed trust colours
28/03/2011 * Added alternate theme options from marc2003
25/03/2011 * Fixed some errors and icons
.......... * Added a lot more options to the skin
24/03/2011 * Added a few missing icons and added options for max image width.
-----------------
*Removed older revisions to fit description*

Any other enhancement requests appreciated.

DONT FORGET TO CHECK OUT THE style 35664
